Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/72nd
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 74th, Loomis, 71st and Ashland, due to, street blockage, near Ashland/72nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Ashland, 74th, Loomis, 71st and Ashland, due to, street blockage, near Ashland/72nd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Damen and LaSalle
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and LaSalle due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and LaSalle due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Damen, and,
  • between LaSalle and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses will be available between Damen and LaSalle to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
